summary: This is a retelling of Tristan and Isolde, set in 1940s France. The script was written by Jean Cocteau.
cast: Madeleine Sologne|Jean Marais|Jean Murat|Junie Astor|Roland Toutain|Jane Marken|Jean d'Yd|Piéral|Alexandre Rignault|Yvonne de Bray|Robert Sidonac|Sandra Venturini
keywords: wedding planning|older man younger woman relationship|leg wound|drunkenness|wine cellar
title: L'éternel retour
